title: "Geospatial startup Unfolded.ai acquired by Foursquare"
excerpt: "Well, that was fast. Just a few months after raising its seed round, Unfolded.ai announced today that it is being acquired by Foursquare. Terms of the deal were not disclosed. The startup had raised a total of about $6 million when we last checked in with them."
